column4: I want to get a UPS, is there one that has software that works with Ubuntu to shut down safely?
i saw just the other day an anouncement that some Major Brand UPS maker was supporting Ubuntu
that may be more of a BIG BUSINESS type site/company. :)
: looks that way.  I just need something simple like the APC home versions.
: not letting me unzip *.zip for some reason.  I have many files and do not wish to do them 1 by 1.
if you had asked that first.. :) i also have the answer to that!
unzip is one of the FEW prograsm vie seen that can do that this way.. .heh     unzip '*.zip'    NOTE the quotes.
its seems to have its own wildcard parsing feature. or at least it used to
no idea why unzipis a bit nonstandard int hat way.. erUSUL 's advice is good for all apps in teneral.
the use of the ' find | xargs  ' is DARN handy to learn/rember about.
